about_the_game:
Risk of Rain returns and so does its soundtrack in this very special release that contains all the original compositions remastered, as well as four brand new pieces!

The music, written by Chris Christodoulou, mixes electronic and prog-rock ingredients, seasoned with a pinch of chiptune spices for extra flavor.

The album features two pieces from guest musicians: composer-extraordinaire Damjan Mravunac is coming in hot with a very SERIOUS cover of Surface Tension; singer-songwriter Maria Papageorgiou is collaborating with Chris in a very special piece that pays homage to Risk of Rain's musical legacy.

The album contains 22 tracks, comes in high quality MP3 & FLAC, and is about 1h 15m long.
